AuthorityController - Class in com.examapp.controllers
Handles operations related to student authority management. APIs available: Retrieve a list of students for a specified class (getStudentList) Grant permissions to students based on provided authority list (setAuthorities) All endpoint require token obtained from logging in Teacher specific: getStudentList setAuthorities
